people.name: Marlin Xie
people.description: Marlin is a high school senior in New York passionate about protecting the environment, especially the ocean. He is a current NOAA Ocean Guardian Youth Ambassador and an EarthEcho International Marine Plastics Ambassador, and has previously worked with other environmental nonprofit organizations. YOI was founded by him to continue advocating for the ocean past a school club he created that was dedicated to a similar mission and into the greater world.

people.name: Ankur Parikh
people.description: Ankur is a high school junior in Southern California who has a strong passion for the environment. He participates in different programs including Cool Irvine and is a NOAA Ocean Guardian Youth Ambassador. He is excited to work with YOI and continue helping protect the natural beauty of our oceans and our planet.

people.name: Grace Corveleyn
people.description: Grace is a high school junior living in New Jersey. Currently, she serves as a high school ambassador for The Climate Initiative and as a NOAA Ocean Guardian Ambassador. She hopes that working with YOI will help her to spread her message of advocacy and awareness towards plastic pollution reduction and marine biodiversity management.

people.name: Angela Liu
people.description: Angela is a high school senior in New York who is excited to further contribute to the amazing climate and environmental initiatives that exist to protect our Earth, and specifically our Earth's oceans. She is currently volunteering for the Wildlife Conservation Society at the New York Aquarium, assisting in educational programs and inspiring people to value nature. She is eager to join a team of other passionate individuals and enable others to take initiative for the causes that they care about.

people.name: Lucine Husain
people.description: Lucine, a high school junior in New York, is passionate about environmental advocacy. He has worked with Our Climate, and hopes to use his knowledge and skills to further his involvement with the environment. He is thrilled to further YOI's mission and continue advocating for oceans.

people.name: Sydney Deb
people.description: Sydney is a current senior from New York hoping to peruse biotechnology in the future. She is passionate about making a difference in the world and her community and loves combining her love for art with that of creative conservation. She's very excited to work with YOI to spread its mission for marine advocacy and education!

people.name: Issac Liu
people.description: Issac is a high school junior in New York City who wants to leave an impact on the world. Through YOI, he hopes to gain more knowledge regarding the environmental issues that our waters are facing and the solutions to solve them. He's excited to help contribute to YOI's mission.

people.name: Madelyn Carrera
people.description: Madelyn is a senior in a New York City high school who is incredibly passionate about marine science. She is currently volunteering for the Wildlife Conservation Society at the New York Aquarium, and she is also part of the NOAA Ocean Guardian Youth Ambassador program. She is excited to be part of YOI and help advocate for our oceans.

people.name: Winston Kan
people.description: Winston is a senior from New York passionate about advocating for environmental policy. Although he is new to marine advocacy, he has history with volunteering and hopes to spread information about ocean policies. He is excited to work with the YOI team, and hopes to learn new things from everyone.

people.name: Maya Aryanfar
people.description: Maya is a high school senior in California passionate about marine advocacy. She is pursuing aquatic and biological research. Additionally, she is a Youth Ambassador for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Association (NOAA). By working with YOI, she hopes to expand access to scientific research nationwide.

people.name: Fatemtuz Zuhura
people.description: Fatemtuz is a high school senior in the state of New York passionate about creating a difference in the world. Although she doesn't have much experience working with ocean advocacy and education, she's determined to make the most of working with YOI to improve her skillsets and work with many influential organizations unanimously focused on bettering our seas.

people.name: Emerson Lee
people.description: Emerson, a high school senior in New York City, is passionate about advocating for environmental conservation. She recently participated in a program called GLA, where she was able to travel to Costa Rica to learn about marine conservation and strategies to help sea turtles. She's excited to expand her knowledge on conservation with other programs in the future and looks forward to working with YOI to advocate for and educate others about the ocean.

people.name: Ryan Kuang
people.description: Ryan is a highschool senior in New York who is eager to raise environmental awareness, especially with ocean related problems. Although he is new to marine advocacy, he has experience working with his school's oceanic club. He hopes to learn more about the ocean and how to better protect it.

people.name: Janssen Gallenero
people.description: Janssen is currently a junior attending a high school in New York City. Passionate about environmental science, she joined her school's Science Olympiad environmental science division. Although she does not have much experience in marine science and advocacy, she hopes by joining YOI that she will learn more about marine life while contributing to YOI's mission.

people.name: Veronica Tom
people.description: Veronica is interested in environmental causes, particularly those related to the ocean. Although she has limited experience in this area, she hopes to expand her understanding of the ocean knowledge, and build her communication skills by working with YOI! Growing up in a beach community, she has seen firsthand the unfortunate effects of plastic pollution on the ocean and beaches and is passionate about addressing this issue. Her favorite marine animals are sea turtles and the dumbo octopuses!

people.name: Sandy Phan
people.description: Sandy is a senior in a small school in California that is delighted to be part of an organization dedicated towards empowering voices of youth in means of oceanic awareness and conservation. This is her first time working with ocean related organizations and she is eager to learn more about her and her team's contributions in protecting marine ecosystems as she goes!

people.name: Poe Sid
people.description: Poe is a high school junior in New York passionate about environmental conservation and advocacy. They are a SEA Education Association alumni, creative writer, and animal-lover. They look forward to contributing to YOI's mission of ocean advocacy and education.

people.name: Chloe Gao
people.description: Chloe is a senior from New York City who's hoping to create a change in the world and the community, which YOI is a part of her journey to achieve this dream. With her passion for the deep seas and its mysteries, she's looking forward to spreading YOI's mission and learning more about what she can do for the ocean!

people.name: Cecil Dong
people.description: Cecil is a senior at a New York high school looking to pursue marine science/biology. Though new to any official conservation work, she's held the ocean and the life within dear to heart since youth. She hopes to put her passion to use and contribute to YOI's mission.

people.name: Jia Wen Lin
people.description: Jia Wen is a high school senior in New York City who's interested in learning about marine science and advocacy. Her involvement in the Oceanic Club at her school has inspired her to continue working with other ocean related organizations such as the YOI. She hopes to learn more about the ocean, its inhabitants, and how to protect them.

people.name: Jessica Salvacruz
people.description: Jessica is an upcoming senior in NYC who is very passionate about digital arts. Through YOI she hopes to utilize her love for digital media mixed with her love for marine life in order to promote and protect our oceans and the creatures within.

people.name: Isabella Zhao
people.description: Isabella is an upcoming high school junior in New York who is interested in expanding her knowledge on marine life and the environmental issues that are affecting our oceans. She is excited to be a part of YOI to help promote and advocate for our oceans.

people.name: Sunny Talusan
people.description: Sunny is a rising high school senior in New York who is passionate about our world's aquatic and marine life. Although they do not have much experience in ocean advocacy, they hope to channel their love for the ocean and its mysteries into meaningful change with YOI. They are excited to contribute to and be a part of the YOI team.

people.name: Arham Tajwar
people.description: Arham Tajwar, a high school junior based in New York City. From a young age possessing a deep fondness towards animals and the sea hopes to express this passion through YOI, with YOI, he hopes to make a change, not just for deep seas but for the world as a whole. Advocacy has been with him for a couple years, expressing his passion through the organization he's part of, and he hopes YOI helps him spread to different areas of advocacy.
